org.apache.poi.ss.formula.functions

Class Irr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.formula.functions.Irr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function 

    public final class Irr
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function
    Calculates the internal rate of return. Syntax is IRR(values) or IRR(values,guess)(计算内部回报率。RST是IRR（值）或IRR（值，猜测）)
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on IRR, Excel IRR

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public ValueEval evaluate(ValueEval[] args,
                          int srcRowIndex,
                          int srcColumnIndex)
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface Function(在接口函数中求值)
        Parameters:
        args - the evaluated function arguments. Empty values are represented with BlankEval or MissingArgEval, never null.(args -已计算的函数参数。空值用BlankEval或MissingArgEval表示，绝不能为空。)
        srcRowIndex - row index of the cell containing the formula under evaluation(srcRowIndex -包含正在评估的公式的单元格的行索引)
        srcColumnIndex - column index of the cell containing the formula under evaluation(srcColumnIndex -包含正在评估的公式的单元格的列索引)
        Returns:
        The evaluated result, possibly an ErrorEval, never null. Note - Excel uses the error code #NUM! instead of IEEE NaN, so when numeric functions evaluate to Double.NaN be sure to translate the result to ErrorEval.NUM_ERROR.(评估的结果（可能是errorEval）永远不会为空。注意- Excel使用错误代码#NUM！而不是IEEE NaN，因此当数字函数的计算结果为Double.NaN时，请确保将结果翻译为WRRFAL.NUM_BER。)

      • irr

        public static double irr(double[] income)
        Computes the internal rate of return using an estimated irr of 10 percent.(使用10%的估计IRR计算内部回报率。)
        Parameters:
        income - the income values.(收入--收入价值观。)
        Returns:
        the irr.(IRR。)

      • irr

        public static double irr(double[] values,
                         double guess)
        Calculates IRR using the Newton-Raphson Method.

        Starting with the guess, the method cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate within 0.00001 percent. If IRR can't find a result that works after 20 tries, the Double.NaN<> is returned.

        The implementation is inspired by the NewtonSolver from the Apache Commons-Math library,

        (使用Newton-Raphson方法计算IRR。该方法从猜测开始，循环计算，直到结果准确度在0.00001%内。如果IRR在尝试20次后找不到有效的结果，则返回Double.NaN<>。该实现的灵感来自于Apache Commons-Math库的NewtonSolver，)
        Parameters:
        values - the income values.(价值观--收入价值观。)
        guess - the initial guess of irr.(guess --IRR的最初猜测。)
        Returns:
        the irr value. The method returns Double.NaN if the maximum iteration count is exceeded(IRR值。如果超过最大迭代计数，则该方法返回Double.NaN)
        See Also:
        http://commons.apache.org

        , http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internal_rate_of_return#Numerical_solution, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newton%27s_method
